frontmatter.title: Using CallerMemberName for Improved Logging in C#
frontmatter.preview: Learn how to use "magic" attributes in C#, such as CallerFilePath, CallerLineNumber, and CallerMemberName, to retrieve caller information and improve logging functionality.
